article: This is my family. There are four people in my _ . _ my father, my mother, my sister and I. My father _ a cook . He cooks nice food. He likes playing chess. My mother is a teacher. She likes books. They two work in the same school. They like tea very much, _ they don't like milk. My name is Lin Yang. _ like playing _ football. My sister, Lin Ting likes _ . And she wants to be a running star.
